prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hanover County (Va.) Clerk's Fee Bills, 1788-1793. Local government records collection, Hanover County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 39017.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Hanover County was formed from New Kent County in 1720.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Hanover County (Va.) Clerk's Fee Bills, 1788-1793. Consists of two bills for court fees issued by Hanover County Clerk William Pollard.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Hanover County Court Records can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. See A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm.

Hanover County is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional Hanover County Court Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Localities Database found at the Library of Virginia web site.
